wired.title: You May Never Use Xiaomi's Phones, But They'll Change Your Life Anyway
wired.topComment: The author assumes that Google sold Motorola because it was unsuccessful in hardware (Motorola phones and new models such as the X and G). However, there have been many articles that quote Google as saying that they knew that it would take many years...

wired.title: Obama's New Order Urges Companies to Share Cyber-Threat Info With the Government
wired.topComment: You would have to be incredibly naive to believe this will be used for legit purposes.

wired.title: Two Revolutionary New Sex Toys, Plus 14 Top-Selling Dildos
wired.topComment: Black silhouettes of the dildos instead of photos, really? Did you run out of courage halfway through the article, WIRED?

wired.title: That ;) You Type Can and Will Be Used Against You in a Court of Law
wired.topComment: Seriously, was there no other topic that could be written on? I can sum this article up in two sentences: Emoticons can be interpreted to have meaning, which means you can get in trouble for it.

wired.title: Japanese Sex Hotels Cater to All Kinds of Fetishes, Even Hello Kitty S&M
wired.topComment: When did Wired turn into such a click-bait site?
